name: Pranav Jain

education.university: Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology

experience_summary: Research Intern at Samsung R&D Institute India, Bangalore (Oct 2024 – Mar 2025). Led project automation, frontend development, and partial backend integration. Automated image evaluation, applied image processing, and reduced human bias.

projects_summary.name: Image Quality Evaluation System
projects_summary.description: Automated image evaluation pipeline comparing Galaxy Enhance-X with other apps. Used a hybrid objective-subjective model to reduce human bias.

projects_summary.name: Topsis Package
projects_summary.description: Python package for multi-criteria decision-making using the TOPSIS method. Includes Flask-based web interface and email system.

projects_summary.name: AID Bridge NGO Web Platform
projects_summary.description: Full-stack web platform for NGO donations.  Includes dashboards for donors and NGOs.

projects_summary.name: Calorie Detection System
projects_summary.description: Automated calorie detection system using YOLOv5 and EasyOCR.  Includes a Flask-based web interface.

participation: Group Representative, improved subgroup project submission rates by 50%
